patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,3 +1,3 @@
 html {
-    box-sizing: border-box;         /* reset */
+    box-sizing: border-box;         /* reset the box mvdel */
 }
\ No newline at end of file

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,3 +1,3 @@
 html {
-    box-sizing: border-box;         /* reset the box mvdel */
+    box-sizing: border-box;         /* reset the box model to not apply default values to margin and padding */
 }
\ No newline at end of file

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,6 +1,6 @@
 *, ::before, ::after {
-    
+    box-sizing: inherit;            /*  */
 }
 
 html {
     box-sizing: border-box;         /* reset the box model to not apply default values to margin and padding */

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,6 +1,6 @@
 *, ::before, ::after {
-    box-sizing: inherit;            /*  */
+    box-sizing: inherit;            /* use the same  */
 }
 
 html {
     box-sizing: border-box;         /* reset the box model to not apply default values to margin and padding */

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,6 +1,6 @@
 *, ::before, ::after {
-    box-sizing: inherit;            /* use the same  */
+    box-sizing: inherit;            /* use the same value as the parent element */
 }
 
 html {
     box-sizing: border-box;         /* reset the box model to not apply default values to margin and padding */

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,6 +1,6 @@
 *, ::before, ::after {
-    box-sizing: inherit;            /* use the same value as the parent element */
+    box-sizing: inherit;            /* target elements use the same value as the parent element */
 }
 
 html {
     box-sizing: border-box;         /* reset the box model to not apply default values to margin and padding */
